trans-unit.source: Mobile Services
trans-unit.target: Mobile Services

trans-unit.source: Mobile Services
trans-unit.target: Mobile Services

trans-unit.source: <token>firstref_zumo</token> is a <token>azure_2</token> service offering designed to make it easy to create highly-functional mobile apps using <token>azure_2</token>.
trans-unit.target: <token>firstref_zumo</token> is a <token>azure_2</token> service offering designed to make it easy to create highly-functional mobile apps using <token>azure_2</token>.

trans-unit.source: <token>nextref_zumo</token> brings together a set of <token>azure_2</token> services that enable backend capabilities for your apps.
trans-unit.target: <token>nextref_zumo</token> brings together a set of <token>azure_2</token> services that enable backend capabilities for your apps.

trans-unit.source: <token>nextref_zumo</token> provides the following backend capabilities in <token>azure_2</token> to support your apps:
trans-unit.target: <token>nextref_zumo</token> provides the following backend capabilities in <token>azure_2</token> to support your apps:

trans-unit.source: Client libraries support mobile app development on various devices, including Windows 8, Windows Phone 8, Android, iPhone, and iPad.
trans-unit.target: Client libraries support mobile app development on various devices, including Windows 8, Windows Phone 8, Android, iPhone, and iPad.

trans-unit.source: Simple provisioning and management of tables for storing app data.
trans-unit.target: Simple provisioning and management of tables for storing app data.

trans-unit.source: Integration with notification services to deliver push notifications to your app.
trans-unit.target: Integration with notification services to deliver push notifications to your app.

trans-unit.source: Integration with well-known identity providers for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Integration with well-known identity providers for authentication.

trans-unit.source: Precise control for authorizing access to tables.
trans-unit.target: Precise control for authorizing access to tables.

trans-unit.source: Supports scripts to inject business logic into data access operations.
trans-unit.target: Supports scripts to inject business logic into data access operations.

trans-unit.source: Integration with other cloud services.
trans-unit.target: Integration with other cloud services.

trans-unit.source: Supports the ability to scale a mobile service instance.
trans-unit.target: Supports the ability to scale a mobile service instance.

trans-unit.source: Service monitoring and logging.
trans-unit.target: Service monitoring and logging.

trans-unit.source: Documentation resources
trans-unit.target: Documentation resources

trans-unit.source: This page links to topics that help you to understand and get started using <token>nextref_zumo</token> on <token>azure_2</token>.
trans-unit.target: This page links to topics that help you to understand and get started using <token>nextref_zumo</token> on <token>azure_2</token>.

trans-unit.source: For the most up-to-date information about <token>nextref_zumo</token>, see the <externalLink><linkText>Mobile Services dev center</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=260441</linkUri></externalLink> .
trans-unit.target: For the most up-to-date information about <token>nextref_zumo</token>, see the <externalLink><linkText>Mobile Services dev center</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=260441</linkUri></externalLink> .

trans-unit.source: Send email from Mobile Services with SendGrid
trans-unit.target: Send email from Mobile Services with SendGrid

trans-unit.source: Demonstrates how to use server side scripts with SendGrid to add email functionality to your Mobile Service.
trans-unit.target: Demonstrates how to use server side scripts with SendGrid to add email functionality to your Mobile Service.

trans-unit.source: Schedule backend jobs in Mobile Services
trans-unit.target: Schedule backend jobs in Mobile Services

trans-unit.source: Demonstrates how to use the <token>nextref_zumo</token> job scheduler functionality to define server script code that is executed on a schedule that you define.
trans-unit.target: Demonstrates how to use the <token>nextref_zumo</token> job scheduler functionality to define server script code that is executed on a schedule that you define.

trans-unit.source: Upload Images to Azure Storage
trans-unit.target: Upload Images to Azure Storage

trans-unit.source: Demonstrates how to use Mobile Services to upload and store user-generated images in Azure Storage from Windows Store (C#) app.
trans-unit.target: Demonstrates how to use Mobile Services to upload and store user-generated images in Azure Storage from Windows Store (C#) app.
